channel.title: Editing Char Looks for clients!
channel.description: Look ive got a quick question ive figured out you can edit a char file into a model so thats the default char e.x. torso equals skillcape with torso. so could you make a quick bmp convert it into a model and then put it into a char file to make it the default char say as a stick figure?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 09:17:41 AM[/size][hr]anybody wanna help? :(

item.title: Editing Char Looks for clients!
item.dc:creator: @karuto karuto
item.description:
@karuto wrote:

Look ive got a quick question ive figured out you can edit a char file into a model so thats the default char e.x. torso equals skillcape with torso. so could you make a quick bmp convert it into a model and then put it into a char file to make it the default char say as a stick figure?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 23, 2007, 09:17:41 AM[/size][hr]anybody wanna help?
